text: This is a list of awards and nominations received by Mamamoo, a South Korean girl group formed in 2014 by Rainbow Bridge World. Mamamoo has received a total of 38 awards out of 146 nominations. ==Korean== ===Asia Artists Awards=== Asia Artists Awards is an awards ceremony organized by South Korea- based global media entities StarNews and MTN. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |rowspan="2"|2016 |Best Entertainer Award (Female Group Category) |rowspan="9"|Mamamoo | |- |Popularity Award (Music Category) | |- |rowspan="2"|2017 |Best Icon Award (Music Category) | |- |Popularity Award (Music Category) | |- |rowspan="3"|2018 |Artist of the Year (Music Category) | |- |Best Music Award | |- |Popularity Award (Music Category) | |- |rowspan="2"|2019 |Popularity Award (Music Category) | |- |Starnews Popularity Award (Female Group) | |} ===Gaon Chart Music Awards=== The Gaon Chart Music Awards is a major music awards show that is held annually in South Korea by the national music record chart Gaon Chart. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |2015 |New Artist of the Year |Mamamoo | |- |rowspan="3"|2017 |rowspan="2"|Song of the Year (February) |"You're the Best" | |- |"1cm (Taller Than You)" | |- |Song of the Year (November) |"Décalcomanie" | |- |2018 |Song of the Year (June) |"Yes I Am" | |- |rowspan="2"|2019 |Song of the Year (March) |"Starry Night" | |- |Song of the Year (July) |"Egotistic" | |- | 2020 |Artist of the Year – Digital Music (November) |"Hip" | |} ===Genie Music Awards=== The Genie Music Awards is a major music awards show that is held annually in South Korea and organized by Genie Music together with their partner network. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |rowspan="7"|2018 |Artist of the Year |rowspan="3"|Mamamoo | |- |Female Group Award | |- |Genie Music Popularity Award | |- |Dance Track (Female) |rowspan="2"|"Starry Night" | |- |rowspan="2"|Song of the Year | |- |rowspan="2"|"Rainy Season" | |- |Vocal Track (Female) | |- |rowspan="6"|2019 |Artist of the Year |rowspan="6"|Mamamoo | |- |Female Group Award | |- |Performing Artist (Female) | |- |Vocal Artist | |- |Genie Music Popularity Award | |- |Global Popularity Award | |} ===Golden Disc Awards=== The Golden Disc Awards is an awards show founded in 1986 that is presented annually by the Music Industry Association of Korea for outstanding achievements in the music industry in South Korea. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |rowspan="4"|2017 |Digital Daesang |rowspan="2"|"You're the Best" | |- |Digital Bonsang | |- |Popularity Award |rowspan="2"|Mamamoo | |- |Asian Choice Popularity Award | |- |rowspan="3"|2018 |Digital Bonsang |"Yes I Am" | |- |Genie Popularity Award |rowspan="2"|Mamamoo | |- |Global Popularity Award | |- |rowspan="4"|2019 |Digital Daesang |rowspan="2"|"Starry Night" | |- |Digital Bonsang | |- |Popularity Award |rowspan="2"|Mamamoo | |- |NetEase Music Global Star Popularity Award | |- |rowspan="4"|2020 |Digital Bonsang |"Gogobebe" | |- |Best Group |rowspan="3"|Mamamoo | |- |Popularity Award | |- |NetEase Music Fans' Choice K-pop Star Award | |} ===Korean Popular Music Awards=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |rowspan="5"|2018 |Song of the Year |"Starry Night" | |- |Artist of the Year |rowspan="3"|Mamamoo | |- |Bonsang Award | |- |Popularity Award | |} ===Melon Music Awards=== The Melon Music Awards is a major music awards show that is held annually in South Korea and organized by LOEN Entertainment through its online music store, Melon. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |2014 |New Artist Award |Mamamoo | |- |2015 |Best Female Dance |"Um Oh Ah Yeah" | |- |rowspan="7"|2016 |Album of the Year |Melting | |- |Song of the Year |rowspan="2"|"You're the Best" | |- |Best Female Dance | |- |Artist of the Year |rowspan="7"|Mamamoo | |- |Top 10 Artists | |- |Netizen Popularity Award | |- |Kakao Hot Star Award | |- |rowspan="4"|2017 |Top 10 Artists | |- |Netizen Popularity Award | |- |Kakao Hot Star Award | |- |Best Female Dance |"Yes I Am" | |- |rowspan="7"|2018 |Album of the Year |Yellow Flower | |- |Song of the Year |rowspan="2"|"Starry Night" | |- |Best Female Dance | |- |Artist of the Year |rowspan="7"|Mamamoo | |- |Top 10 Artists | |- |Netizen Popularity Award | |- |Kakao Hot Star Award | |- |rowspan="4"|2019 |Artist of the Year | |- |Top 10 Artists | |- |Netizen Popularity Award | |- |Best Female Dance |"Gogobebe" | |} ===Mnet Asian Music Awards=== The Mnet Asian Music Awards is one of the major K-pop music awarding ceremonies held annually by CJ E&M; through its music channel Mnet. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |rowspan="2"|2015 |UnionPay Song of the Year |rowspan="2"|"Um Oh Ah Yeah" | |- |Best Vocal Performance Female | |- |rowspan="4"|2016 |HotelsCombined Artist of the Year |rowspan="2"|Mamamoo | |- |Best Female Group | |- |HotelsCombined Song of the Year |rowspan="2"|"You're the Best" | |- |Best Vocal Performance Group | |- |rowspan="4"|2017 |Qoo10 Song of the Year |rowspan="2"|"Yes I Am" | |- |Best Vocal Performance Group | |- |Qoo10 Artist of the Year |rowspan="2"|Mamamoo | |- |Best Female Group | |- |rowspan="7"|2018 |Song of the Year |rowspan="2"|"Starry Night" | |- |Best Vocal Performance Group | |- |Artist of the Year |rowspan="5"|Mamamoo | |- |Worldwide Icon of the Year | |- |Best Female Group | |- |Worldwide Fans' Choice Top 10 | |- |Favorite Vocal Artist | |- |rowspan="7"|2019 |Song of the Year |rowspan="2"|"Gogobebe" | |- |Best Vocal Performance Group | |- |Artist of the Year |rowspan="5"|Mamamoo | |- |Best Female Group | |- |Worldwide Fans' Choice Top 10 | |- |Favorite Vocal Artist | |- |2019 MAMA Qoo10 Favorite Female Artist | |} ===Seoul Music Awards=== The Seoul Music Awards is an awards show founded in 1990 that is presented annually by Sports Seoul for outstanding achievements in the music industry in South Korea. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |rowspan="4"|2015 |Bonsang Award |rowspan="14"|Mamamoo | |- |New Artist Award | |- |Popularity Award | |- |Hallyu Special Award | |- |rowspan="3"|2016 |Bonsang Award | |- |Popularity Award | |- |Hallyu Special Award | |- |rowspan="4"|2017 |Daesang Award | |- |Bonsang Award | |- |Popularity Award | |- |Hallyu Special Award | |- |rowspan="4"|2018 |Bonsang Award | |- |Popularity Award | |- |Hallyu Special Award | |- |TikTok Dance Performance Award |"Yes I Am" | |- |rowspan="4"|2019 |Daesang Award |rowspan="9"|Mamamoo | |- |Bonsang Award | |- |Popularity Award | |- |Hallyu Special Award | |- |rowspan="5"|2020 |Daesang Award | |- |Bonsang Award | |- |Popularity Award | |- |Hallyu Special Award | |- |QQ Music Most Popular K-Pop Artist Award | |- |} ===Soribada Best K-Music Awards=== The Soribada Best K-Music Awards is a music awards show presented by Soribada to celebrate the best in K-pop music. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |rowspan="3"|2017 |Daesang Award |rowspan="11"|Mamamoo | |- |Bonsang Award | |- |Popularity Award | |- |rowspan=4|2018 |Daesang Award | |- |Bonsang Award | |- |Popularity Award (Female) | |- |Global Fandom Award | |- |rowspan=3|2019 |Live Performance of the Year (Daesang) | |- |Bonsang Award | |- |Popularity Award (Female) | |- |2020 |Bonsang Award | |} ===The Fact Music Awards=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- |rowspan="2"|2018 |Artist of the Year (Bonsang) |rowspan="3"|Mamamoo | |- |Best Performer | |- | 2019 | Artist of the Year (Bonsang) | |} ==International== ===BreakTudo Awards=== The BreakTudo Awards is a Brazilian award show held annually by BreakTudo, a news and entertainment website. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- | 2018 | rowspan="2"|K-pop Female Group | rowspan="2"|Mamamoo | |- | 2019 | |- |} ===MTV Europe Music Awards=== An MTV Europe Music Awards (commonly abbreviated as a EMAs) is an award presented by Viacom International Media Networks to honour artists and music in pop culture. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! width="5%" | Year ! width="45%"| Category ! width="40%"| Recipient ! width="10%"| Result |- | 2017 | Best Korean Act | Mamamoo | |} ==Other awards== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! style="background:silver"| Year ! style="background:silver"| Award ! style="background:silver"| Category ! style="background:silver"| Recipient ! style="background:silver"| Result |- | 2014 | Seoul Success Awards | Rookie of the Year | rowspan="11"|Mamamoo | |- | rowspan="3"| 2016 | 2015 Bugs Music Awards | Idol of the Year | |- | Cublic Media | SNS Communication | |- | Sports DongA Awards | Trendy Word | |- | rowspan="7"|2019 | rowspan="4"|V Live Awards | Global Partnership Award | |- | Artist Top 10 | |- | Best Channel – 1 million followers | |- | Global Artist Top 12 | |- | Korea Producer Awards | Performer Awards (Singer category) | |- | Korean Popular Culture and Arts Awards | style="text-align:center;"| Minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism Commendation | |- | 32nd Grimae Awards | Best Entertainer Award | |- |} == Notes == ==References== Mamamoo Category:Mamamoo
title: List of awards and nominations received by Mamamoo
